Lyric:
[by:WY梦总会醒]
[ti:Let Her Go]
[ar:Jason Chen]
[al:英语调调]
[by:梦总会醒]
[offset:-100]
[00:00.00]Well you only need the light when it's burning low  　　
[00:04.20]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow   　　
[00:07.80]Only know you love her when you let her go   
[00:14.50]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low   
[00:18.32]Only hate the road when you're missing home   　
[00:21.90]Only know you love her when you let her go   　
[00:28.75]And you let her go   　　
[00:30.79]Staring at the bottom of your glass   　　
[00:32.75]Hoping one day you'll make a dream last   　　
[00:36.28]But dreams come slow and they go so fast   　
[00:44.45]You see her when you close your eyes   　　
[00:46.75]Maybe one day you'll understand why   　　
[00:50.30]Everything you touch surely dies  
[00:57.30]Will you only need the light when it's burning low   　　
[01:01.28]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow   　　
[01:04.60]Only know you love her when you let her go   　　
[01:11.30]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low   　
[01:15.57]Only hate the road when you're missing home   　
[01:19.00]Only know you love her when you let her go   　
[01:26.18]And you let her go     
[01:27.67]Staring at the ceiling in the dark   　
[01:29.30]Same old empty feeling in your heart   　
[01:33.10]Cos love comes slow and it goes so fast   　
[01:39.60]So fast    
[01:41.32]Well you see her when you fall asleep   　
[01:43.80]But never to touch and never to keep 
[01:47.46]Cos you loved her too much and you dive too deep   　
[01:54.00]Well you only need the light when it's burning low   　　
[01:57.90]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow   　　
[02:01.50]Only know you love her when you let her go   　　
[02:08.50]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low  
[02:12.40]Only hate the road when you're missing home   　　
[02:16.37]Only know you love her when you let her go   　　
[02:23.10]Will you only need the light when it's burning low   　　
[02:27.00]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow   　
[02:30.15]Only know you love her when you let her go   　　
[02:36.75]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low   　　
[02:41.00]Only hate the road when you're missing home   　　
[02:44.60]Only know you love her when you let her go   　　
[02:51.70]And you let her go
